item.title: @elonmusk: Our AI5 chip design is almost done and AI6 is in early stages, but there will be AI7, AI8, AI9 … aim...
item.description: Our AI5 chip design is almost done and AI6 is in early stages, but there will be AI7, AI8, AI9 … aiming for a 9 month design cycle. Join us to work on what I predict will be the highest volume AI chips in the world by far!

item.title: @elonmusk: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foo...
item.description: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of light, it was the season of darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair. I think it was Charles Dikkens (with two k’s) who wrote that.

item.title: @elonmusk: The Philippines will be the first country in Southeast Asia to deliver Starlink Direct to Cell. In p...
item.description: The Philippines will be the first country in Southeast Asia to deliver Starlink Direct to Cell. In partnership with@enjoyglobe, millions of people will stay connected in remote areas that didn't have coverage before.

item.title: @elonmusk: Once the Dems realized that importing illegals who are dependent on government handouts would be a g...
item.description: Once the Dems realized that importing illegals who are dependent on government handouts would be a guaranteed path to power, they opened the floodgates and refused to deport even hardened criminals. Incentives explain outcomes.

item.description: The Colossus 2 supercomputer for@Grokis now operational. First Gigawatt training cluster in the world. Upgrades to 1.5GW in April.

item.title: @elonmusk: Democrats take power and immediately disenfranchise their opponents. Red state republicans can eithe...
item.description: Democrats take power and immediately disenfranchise their opponents. Red state republicans can either disenfranchise them first, or end up living in a vassal district of a blue state. There’s no third option.

item.title: @elonmusk: One of the most obvious things that maps like this one immediately confirm is that regular people ar...
item.description: One of the most obvious things that maps like this one immediately confirm is that regular people are actually very good at intuiting which neighborhoods are dangerous and which ones aren’t. Progressives sometimes get upset at the idea that there’s any such thing as a, “bad neighborhood,” but, in fact, crime is exactly where people think it is.

item.title: @elonmusk: It’s all medical fraud. After my daughter’s pediatrician at Kaiser Permanente tried to put her on pu...
item.description: It’s all medical fraud. After my daughter’s pediatrician at Kaiser Permanente tried to put her on puberty blockers and wrong-sex hormones when she was only 14, I did an undercover story when I pretended to be “nonbinary.” I was approved by my Kaiser doctors over Zoom for a double mastectomy (top surgery) and a phalloplasty (fake p*nis) made from the skin tissue on my thigh in under 9 months. It was only a $100 co-pay for my elective mastectomy and $200 co-pay for my phalloplasty yet the surgeons would bill $25k for mastectomy and $135k for the phalloplasty.@FTC@SwipeWright@aboutKP
